Xanathar's Guide to Everything is a supplement to the 5th edition of Dungeons &
Dragons. It contains new subclasses, spells, and magic items. This guide is meant
for players and Dungeon Masters who want to add more options to their game.

Xanathar’s Guide to Everything pdf has been released on Nov 21, 2017. It was
created by Wizards of the Coast and is considered to be an official supplement for
5th Edition Dungeons and Dragons. This book contains new subclasses, spells, and
equipment for players to use in their campaigns. It also features guidelines for
Dungeon Masters on how to run campaigns with these new additions, giving DMs
more tools to make their game more interesting and fun.
